mapper.sql: t.id, t.user_id, t.type, t.total, t.money, t.use_money, t.no_use_money, t.collection, t.to_user, t.remark, t.add_time, t.last_update_dtime
mapper.insert: insert into account_log ( user_id, type, total, money, use_money, no_use_money, collection, to_user, remark, add_time, last_update_dtime ) values( #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{useMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{noUseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{collection,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{toUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
